card.name: Aftershock
card.text: Eminence — At the beginning of each end step, if a Tank you control was dealt 3 or more damage this turn, it deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.

card.name: Arcane Comet
card.text: Eminence — Whenever a Mage you control attacks, you may have it deal 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Baron Nashor
card.text: (This can be attacked.) Shroud +1: You can attack Baron Nashor. When a player captures Baron Nashor, that player draws 4 cards and gains an emblem with “Creatures you control get +3/+3.”

card.name: Conquerer
card.text: Eminence — If a Marksman you control would deal damage, it deals true damage instead.

card.name: Dark Harvest
card.text: Eminence — Fighters and Assassins you control have “Consume: Put a +1/+1 counter on this champion.”

card.name: Electrocution
card.text: Eminence — If a Fighter or Assassin you control would deal 3 or more combat damage, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead.

card.name: Fleet Footwork
card.text: Eminence — Marksmen you control have haste.

card.name: Glacial Augment
card.text: Eminence — Whenever a Support you control deals combat damage to a creature, stun that creature.

card.name: Grasping Undying
card.text: Eminence — Whenever a Tank you control deals combat damage you gain 1 life.

card.name: Guardian
card.text: Eminence — Tanks you control can block an additional creature.

card.name: Hailing Blades
card.text: Eminence — Whenever a Fighter or Assassin you control attacks, you may have it get -X/-0 and gain double strike until end of turn, where X is half its power, rounded down.

card.name: Inhibitor
card.text: (This can be attacked.) Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped and with an additional -1/-1 counter on them. When Inhibitor is captured, each opponent spawns a colorless 5/5 Minion.

card.name: Kleptomancy
card.text: Eminence — Whenever a Support you control deals combat damage to an opponent, draw a card.

card.name: Large Krug
card.text: When Large Krug dies, spawn two colorless 1/2 Golem Monsters.

card.name: Lethal Tempo
card.text: Eminence — Whenever a Marksman you control becomes blocked it gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: The Nexus
card.text: (This can be attacked.) At the beginning of your upkeep, spawn three 1/2 Minions, three 2/1 Minions, and one 3/3 Minion. When The Nexus leaves the battlefield, you lose the game.

card.name: Phase Rush
card.text: Eminence — At the beginning of your end step, untap all Mages you control.

card.name: Predator
card.text: Eminence — Fighters and Assassins you control have engage and haste.

card.name: Pressed Attack
card.text: Eminence — Whenever a Marksmen you control attacks, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Rift Herald
card.text: Menace At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may destroy target Turret an opponent controls.

card.name: Rift Scuttler
card.text: T, Sacrifice Rift Scuttler: Until end of turn, Monster spells you cast cost one mana of any color less to cast.

card.name: Smite
card.text: Summoner spell, split second Smite deals 5 true damage to target Minion or Monster.

card.name: Summon Aery
card.text: Eminence — Whenever a Mage you control attacks or activates an ability for the first time each turn, you may create a 1/1 Sprite with flying and haste. Sacrifice it at end of turn.

card.name: Twisted East Altar
card.text: (This can be attacked.) At the beginning of each opponents upkeep, that player reveals a random card from their hand. When Twisted East Altar is captured, return it to the battlefield under that players control.

card.name: Twisted West Altar
card.text: (This can be attacked.) Your opponents play with the top card of their library revealed. When Twisted West Altar is captured, return it to the battlefield under that players control.

card.name: The Unsealed Spellbook
card.text: Eminence — Whenever you cast a Support spell, you may choose an summoner card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your command zone.

card.name: Accompanied Knight
card.text: When Accompanied Knight enters the battlefield, spawn a 1/1 white Squire. Knights you control have first strike as long as you control a Squire.

card.name: Bonded Roc
card.text: Flying Whenever Bonded Roc or another Vastaya enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Cast Doubt
card.text: Silence target creature until end of turn.

card.name: Chroma Dancer
card.text: Flash When Chroma Dancer enters the battlefield choose a color. Target creature you control gains protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

card.name: Cloud Dragon
card.text: Flying, vigilance 2W, T: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Drought
card.text: Lands have “T: Add C.” Whenever a land is tapped for colored mana, that land doesn’t untap during it’s controllers next untap step.

card.name: The Great Master Kusho
card.text: First strike, vigilance At the beginning of your end step, if The Great Master Kusho did not attack or block this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it. At the beginning of each upkeep, The Great Master Kusho gets shield X until end of turn, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Honored Knight
card.text: Honored Knight gets +1/+1 for each Squire you control.

card.name: Howling Gale
card.text: Exile target creature. Then you may pay 1W. If you don’t, return that creature to the battlefield.

card.name: Ionian Mystic
card.text: T: Target creature or player gets shield 1 until end of turn.

card.name: Kinkou Balance Keeper
card.text: Whenever a creature you control blocks alone, it gets shield 2 until end of turn.

card.name: Lhotlan Battle-Dancer
card.text: Whenever Lhotlan Battle-Dancer or another Vastaya enters the battlefield under your control, Vastaya creatures you control get shield 1 until end of turn.

card.name: Promising Squire
card.text: Knights you control get +1/+0. When a Knight you control dies, choose an equipment that was attached to that creature when it died and attach it to Promising Squire. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Promising Squire and it becomes a Knight. (This effect does not stop at end of turn.)

card.name: Razorbeak
card.text: Flying Other Birds you control get +1/+0 and have flying. At the beginning of your upkeep, spawn a 0/1 white Bird.

card.name: Rune-Binder
card.text: When Rune-Binder enters the battlefield, exile target creature until Rune-Binder leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Sword of the Divine
card.text: Equip 2 Equipped creature has first strike. 2/W2/W: Equipped creature gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Blue Sentinel
card.text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost U less to cast. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery, you may draw a card. If you don’t, scry 2.

card.name: Citadel Professor
card.text: When Citadel Professor enters the battlefield, draw two cards.

card.name: Fortune Finder
card.text: Whenever Fortune Finder deals combat damage to a player, you may scry 2.

card.name: Frost Knight
card.text: When Frost Knight enters the battlefield, stun target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Frozen in Thought
card.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, return it to it’s owners hand. That player can’t cast spells with the same name as that spell this turn.

card.name: Glacial Insight
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, scry X, where X is the number of basic Island you control.

card.name: Hawkshot Archer
card.text: Reach Whenever Hawkshot Archer attacks, scry 1.

card.name: Ice-Tooth Pirhannas
card.text: Defender Whenever Ice-Tooth Pirhanna’s deals combat damage to a creature, stun that creature.

card.name: Intelligence Briefing
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, you may pay U. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Ocean Dragon
card.text: Flying, hexproof Creatures your opponents control lose haste, first strike, and double strike and can’t have or gain those abilities.

card.name: Serpant of the Scrolls
card.text: When Serpant of the Scrolls or another Vastaya enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Silverwing Duster
card.text: Creatures you control with flying have hexproof.

card.name: Student of the Lightbringers
card.text: When Student of the Lightbringers enters the battlefield, silence target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Zhonyas Hourglass
card.text: Equip 2 Equipped creature has “T: Add C.” 2/U2/U: Equipped creature phases out.

card.name: Ancient Dragon
card.text: Flying, menace 4BB: Return Ancient Dragon from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only if a Dragon died this turn.

card.name: Armored Invaders
card.text: When Armored Invaders deals combat damage to an opponent, gain control of target land that player controls. That land is a Waste for as long as you control it. At the beginning of your upkeep, for each land you control but don’t own, pay 2 or return that land to it’s owners control.

card.name: Black Cleaver
card.text: Equip 2 Equipped creature has menace. 2/B2/B: Equipped gains grievous wounds until end of turn.

card.name: Castle Rats
card.text: Whenever Castle Rats deals combat damage to an opponent, you may sacrifice it. If you do, that opponent discards a card at random.

card.name: Dire Wildclaw
card.text: Dire Wildclaw gets +1/+1 for each other Wolf you control.

card.name: Encase in True Ice
card.text: When Encase in True Ice enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Encase in True Ice leaves the battlefield. That creature enters the battlefield with an additional -1/-1 counter on it.

card.name: Finish the Job
card.text: Destroy target creature with a -1/-1 counter on it. Draw a card.

card.name: Frostbite Abyssal
card.text: You may cast Frostbite Abyssal from your graveyard if you sacrifice a Squire in addition to its other costs.

card.name: Murk Wolves
card.text: Menace

card.name: Noxian Contract
card.text: At the beginning of the next end step, if a creature an opponent controls died this turn, draw 3 cards. Otherwise, discard a card.

card.name: Putrid Giant
card.text: Menace, Trample At the beginning of your end step, discard a card. When Putrid Giant deals combat damage to an opponent, that player discards a card.

card.name: Stolen Insight
card.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card, then draws a card. Scry 2.

card.name: Trenches of War
card.text: Whenever a creature attacks you or permanent you control, if that creature doesn’t have a -1/-1 counter on it, put a -1/-1 counter on it.

card.name: Vilemaw Twisted Queen
card.text: Reach, menace, deathtouch, shroud Vilemaw, Twisted Queen can block an additional creature each combat. Creatures fighting, blocking, or being blocked by Vilemaw, Twisted Queen lose first strike and double strike. 4BBBB, T: Each creature your opponents control fights Vilemaw, Twisted Queen.

card.name: Arms Race
card.text: At the beginning of each players upkeep, that player may search their library for an equipment card and put it onto the battlefield under their control. If they do, that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Blade of the Ruined King
card.text: Equip 2 Equipped creature gets +2/+0. 2/R2/R: Equipped creature gains engage until end of turn.

card.name: Brambleback
card.text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, target creature you control gains grievous wounds and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Dragon Cultist
card.text: Whenever a Dragon creature enters the battlefield under your control, sacrifice Dragon Cultist. If you do, put two +1/+1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Drive Mad
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. If G was spent to cast Drive Mad, that creature also gains engage until end of turn.

card.name: Eager Knight
card.text: Haste Eager Knight has first strike as long as you control a Squire.

card.name: General Lee Tai
card.text: Haste Whenever a creature blocks or becomes blocked by General Lee Tai, silence that creature and unattach all equipment from it.

card.name: Honorable Squire
card.text: Whenever a Knight you control becomes blocked by a creature an opponent controls, you may have Honorable Squire fight that creature.

card.name: Improvising Explosivneer
card.text: T, Sacrifice an artifact: Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Infernal Dragon
card.text: Flying, haste As long as Infernal Dragon is attacking, other attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Rousing Knight
card.text: Haste Rousing Knight must attack each turn if able. Squires you control have haste and must attack each turn if able.

card.name: Shimon Prankster
card.text: Whenever Shimon Prankster or another Vastaya you control enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Shock Awake
card.text: Deal 2 damage to any target. If a creature was dealt damage this way, untap it.

card.name: The Smithies Squire
card.text: When The Smithies Squire enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an equipment card. If you do shuffle you library and put that card on top of it.

card.name: Squire
card.text: T: Target Knight you control gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Trebuchet Engineer
card.text: Reach R, T: Target creature you control gains flying until end of turn. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Blessed Gifts
card.text: At the beginning of you upkeep, if you control a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it, draw a card.

card.name: Gift of Nature
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control without a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Gromp
card.text: Reach As long as Gromp hasn’t been dealt damage it has double strike.

card.name: Land Fisher
card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Land Fisher.

card.name: Mountain Dragon
card.text: Flying, trample Whenever Mountain Dragon deals combat damage to an opponent, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Natural Consequences
card.text: You may cast Natural Consequences as if it had flash if it targets a permanent that entered the battlefield this turn. Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Ottrani Charger
card.text: Whenever Ottrani Charger or another Vastaya enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Shimon Treescout
card.text: Reach Other Vastaya creatures you control have reach.

card.name: Stampede Herder
card.text: Whenever a creature you control engages, that creature gains trample until the end of turn.

card.name: Strig Scout
card.text: Whenever Strig Scout or another Vastaya creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Warmogs Armor
card.text: Equip 2 Equipped creature gets +0/+2. 2/G2/G: Regenerate equipped creature.

card.name: Barbarians Bloodlust
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature is goaded and has engage.

card.name: Charging Thunderhorn
card.text: Haste, engage, trample Charging Thunderhorn must attack each turn if able.

card.name: Dragon Egg Tender
card.text: 2RG, T: Spawn a 0/1 Dragon Egg with defender. Whenever a Dragon Egg you control dies, you may play a Dragon card from your hand without paying it’s mana cost.

card.name: Elder Dragon
card.text: Flying, double strike This spell cost 2 less to cast for each Dragon card in your graveyard. Other Dragons you control get +1/+1 and have double strike.

card.name: Elder Vastayashairei
card.text: Flying, vigilance, first strike, trample W, T: Target Vastaya gets shield 1 until end of turn. U, T: Counter target spell that targets a Vastaya you control. That spells controller draws a card. R, T: Deal 1 damage to target non-Vastaya creature. G, T: Search your library for a Vastaya creature card then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

card.name: Executioner Troll
card.text: Whenever Executioner Troll deals combat damage to a tapped creature, destroy that creature.

card.name: Iceborn Knight
card.text: Whenever Iceborn Knight deals combat damage to a creature, stun that creature.

card.name: Lissandras Story Hunters
card.text: UB, T: Each opponent mills 2. Then exile target card from an opponents graveyard.

card.name: Marai Healer
card.text: Whenever Marai Healer or another Vastaya enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life for each Vastaya you control.

card.name: Rampaging Thunderhorn
card.text: When Rampaging Thunderhorn attacks, stun it and up to one target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Riposte
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell, activated ability, or triggered ability.

card.name: Shimon Ambush Leader
card.text: Whenever Shimon Ambush Leader or another Vastaya enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gains haste and engage until end of turn.

card.name: Silverwing Rider
card.text: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Tempestuous Baloth
card.text: Defender, Engage When an opponent attacks you or a permanent you control, Tempestuous Baloth loses defender. (This effect does not wear off at end of turn.)

card.name: Tithe Collector
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, counter that spell unless they pay 1 for each spell they have cast this turn.

card.name: Trifarion Knight
card.text: First strike, grievous wounds

card.name: Vengeful Knight
card.text: Whenever a Squire you control dies, Vengeful Knight gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Whimsey
card.text: Target creature you control gains first strike until end of turn. Target creature an opponent controls becomes 0/2 and loses all abilities until end of turn.

card.name: Barrier
card.text: Summoner spell You or target creature you control gets shield 5 until end of turn.

card.name: Basilisk Rider
card.text: Menace

card.name: Cleanse
card.text: Summoner spell Cleanse target creature you control.

card.name: Exhaust
card.text: Summoner spell Target creature gets -2/-2 and loses first strike and double strike until until end of turn.

card.name: Flash
card.text: Summoner spell Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Ghost
card.text: Summoner spell Target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn. That creature can’t be blocked this turn.

card.name: Ice-Stone Squire
card.text: Whenever a Knight you control deals combat damage to a creature, stun that creature.

card.name: Ignite
card.text: Summoner spell, grievous wounds Deal 3 true damage to any target.

card.name: Lissandras Engagement
card.text: Stun up to X target creatures an opponent controls, where X is the number of U spent to cast Lissandra’s Engagement. Destroy up to Y target creatures an opponent controls, where Y is the number of B spent to cast Frostbite.

card.name: Monk of Hirana
card.text: T: Add C. When Monk of Hirana dies, you may search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Noxian Arms Dealer
card.text: When Noxian Arms Dealer enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact you control. If you do, create an artifact equipment token with “Equip 1” and “Equip creature gets +1/+1”

card.name: Promote
card.text: Summoner spell Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. That creature gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Revive
card.text: Summoner spell Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. That creature doesn’t untap during its controllers next untap step.

card.name: Surge
card.text: Summoner spell Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains engage and trample until end of turn.

card.name: Teleport
card.text: Summoner spell Search your hand and/or library for a champion card and exile it. Put three time counters on the exiled card. If it doesn’t have suspend, it gains suspend. If you searched your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Banshees Veil
card.text: Equip 4 Whenever an opponent casts a spell or activates an ability that targets equipped creature, counter that spell or ability and unattach Banshee’s Veil.

card.name: Cull
card.text: Equip 1 At the beginning of your upkeep, if Cull is equipped to a creature, put a farm counter on it. Then, if it has three or more farm counters on it, you may sacrifice it. If you do, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Fountain Obelisk
card.text: Defender, indestructible, hexproof Fountain Obelisk gets +1/+0 for each attacking creature. As long as Fountain Obelisk is blocking, other blocking creatures you control get +0/+1. T: Deal 5 true damage to target attacking creature.

card.name: Inhibitor Turret
card.text: Defender Inhibitor Turret gets +1/+0 for each attacking creature. As long as Inhibitor Turret is blocking, other blocking creatures you control get +0/+1.

card.name: Inner Turret
card.text: Defender Inner Turret gets +1/+0 for each attacking creature.

card.name: Nexus Turret
card.text: Defender Nexus Turret gets +1/+0 for each attacking creature. As long as Nexus Turret is blocking, other blocking creatures you control get +0/+1. When Nexus Turret enters the battlefield, create a copy of it.

card.name: Outer Turret
card.text: Defender

card.name: Perfectly Timed Stopwatch
card.text: Equip 2 Sacrifice Perfectly Timed Stopwatch: Equipped creature phases out.

card.name: The Citadel of Dawn
card.text: T, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Add WW, UU, or WU.

card.name: Concealing Canopy
card.text: (T: Add R or G.) Concealing Canopy enters the battlefield tapped. R/GR/G, T: Creature you control gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Conquered Terrain
card.text: (T: Add B or R.) Conquered Terrain enters the battlefield tapped if you control a Plains, Island, or Forest.

card.name: Emerging Landscape
card.text: T: Add C. 1, T, Sacrifice Emerging Landscape: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, or Forest and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: First Lands
card.text: (T: Add W or G.) First Lands enters the battlefield tapped if you control an Island, Swamp, or Mountain.

card.name: Frost Barrens
card.text: (T: Add U or B.) Frost Barrens enters the battlefield tapped. U/BU/B, T: Target creature loses haste and double strike until end of turn.

card.name: The Hidden City of Ixtal
card.text: T: Add RR, GG, or RG. Activate this ability only if a creature you control dealt combat damage to a player this turn.

card.name: High Silvermere
card.text: (T: Add W or U.) High Silvermere enters the battlefield tapped. W/UW/U, T: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Howling Abyss
card.text: (T: Add U or B.) Howling Abyss enters the battlefield tapped if you control a Plains, Mountain, or Forest.

card.name: The Immortal Bastion
card.text: T, Sacrifice a creature: Add BB, RR, or BR. If that mana is spent on a creature spell, it gains haste.

card.name: Palace Gardens
card.text: (T: Add W or U.) Palace Gardens enters the battlefield tapped if you control a Swamp, Mountain, or Forest.

card.name: Petricite Grove
card.text: Other nonbasic lands are Wastes. Noncreature spells cost 1 more to cast.

card.name: Pit Mine
card.text: (T: Add B or R.) Pit Mine enters the battlefield tapped. B/RB/R, T: Target creature must block this turn if able.

card.name: The Placidium of Navori
card.text: T: Add WW, GG, or GW. Activate this ability only if you control 5 or more creatures and/or lands.

card.name: Rivers of Grass
card.text: (T: Add W or G.) Rivers of Grass enters the battlefield tapped. G/WG/W, T: Untap target creature you control.

card.name: Runeterra Wilds
card.text: (T: Add R or G.) Runeterra Wilds enters the battlefield tapped if you control a Plains, Island, or Swamp
